teacheasy.data

Class AnswerBoxObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.PageObject
      • teacheasy.data.AnswerBoxObject

  • public class AnswerBoxObject
extends PageObject
    Encapsulates the data that describes an Answer Box Object as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format. Extends the page object supertype.
    Version:
    1.1 08 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Sam Raeburn, Sam Hall

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class teacheasy.data.PageObject

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnswerBoxObject

        public AnswerBoxObject(float nXStart,
               float nYStart,
               int nCharacterLimit,
               int nMarks,
               boolean nRetry,
               boolean nNumerical,
               float nUpperBound,
               float nLowerBound,
               java.lang.String... nAnswers)
        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nXStart - Relative start position.
        nYStart - Relative end position.
        nCharacterLimit - Character limit for the answer field.
        nMarks - Marks awarded for a correct answer.
        nRetry - Indicates whether the question is retry-able.
        nNumerical - Indicates if the answer is numerical.
        nUpperBound - The upper limit of the numerical answer range.
        nLowerBound - The lower limit of the numerical answer range.
        nAnswers - The possible answers as a varargs string set.
